original_title: Twenty-Six Takes on Life Without Allen
overview: Allen's fianc√©e and best mate use a Handycam to 'communicate' with him after he's hospitalised in a coma. What starts out as a birthday present for Allen to "have a laugh" when he gets back and see that he hasn't "missed much" shifts an already complex relationship into unexpected territory.
title: Twenty-Six Takes on Life Without Allen
